topic.title: Rhodesian Forces - Volume 1 & 2
topic.body: A collection of original films describing the major units of the Rhodesian Forces, plus footage from external operations.

topic.title: Defend Your Castle - PC
topic.body: Prepare to Defend your Castle against a relentless army of crayon invaders! Those crafty Barbarian hordes have amassed their forces once again to challenge your domain. Will you and your court rise to the challenge, or stand aside as they raze your Castle to the ground?

topic.title: Sudden Strike Anthology with Hidden Stroke II
topic.body:
This package includes the following: 

   Sudden Strike
   Sudden Strike II
   Sudden Strike III
   Sudden Strike Forever
   Total War
   Total War II
   
   Hidden Stroke II

In case there is a problem with the setup, there is a fix text file added as well. 


Note: Hidden Stroke II requires administrator privileges in order to run
